scripts.deva: docker compose -f docker-compose-dev.yml up --force-recreate --build -V --attach api --attach bot_rest-proxy --attach bot_gateway-proxy --attach bot_bot --attach dash
scripts.db: cd ./api/ && yarn dotenv -e ../.env-dev yarn prisma studio
scripts.dbpush: cd ./api/ && yarn dotenv -e ../.env-dev yarn prisma db push
scripts.dbreset: cd ./api/ && yarn dotenv -e ../.env-dev yarn prisma migrate reset
